author: Staff Reporter
text:
A woman and her two minor children were found dead in a well at Udumalpet on Sunday.

The deceased were identified as S. Kalaiselvi (34), Naveena (7) and Guhan (10 months). Police sources said Kalaiselvi jumped into the well after throwing the children into it.

She had locked her husband and elder daughter inside the house before taking the extreme step. The two children had problems in hearing and were under treatment for long, sources said.
title: Woman throws children into well, jumps to death
